title: 705 77 "The Moment of Resolution! Corazon's Farewell Smile!"Transliteration: "Kakugo no Toki - Korason Wakare no Egao!" (Japanese:覚悟の時 コラソン別れの笑顔！) Satoshi Itō Tomohiro Nakayama August 16, 2015(2015-08-16) February 23, 2025
transformers_text: 705 77 The Moment of Resolution Corazon's Farewell Smile Transliteration Kaku go no Toki Kora son Waka re no E gao Japanese Satoshi It Tomohiro Nakayama August 16 2015 2015 08 16 February 23 2025 Corazon force feeds Law the Op Op Fruit and has him deliver an important message to the navy about Do flamingo's plan to takeover Dress rosa but Law unknowingly gives the message to a Don quixote pirate Ver go who brutally beats him and Corazon before informing Do flamingo of Rosin ante's treachery The Don quixote Pirates arrive on Minion Island and Do flamingo traps the remaining pirates in his Birdcage as Corazon resolves to have Law survive and remember his smile
